title: Vijay rally crush: At least 39 killed at political event in Tamil Nadu
summary:
At least 40 dead in crush at political rally in India

Pictures online showed shoes and water bottles strewn across the road where the crush happened

Police have filed a case against three senior members of Vijay's TVK party. Potential charges relate to homicide and negligent conduct, they said. Ta

claims: Vijay rally crush: At least 39 killed at political event in Tamil Nadu.

At least 40 dead in crush at political rally in India

Pictures online showed shoes and water bottles strewn across the road where the crush happened

Police have filed a case against three senior members of Vijay's TVK party.
Tamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin told reporters that the victims included nine children, at least 17 women, and 13 men.
Tens of thousands of people had gathered on Saturday at a campaign event for actor-turned-politician Vijay, in the southern Karur district.
Vijay was addressing the rally in Karur district when the crowd surged suddenly, forcing him to halt his speech.
Images broadcast on television showed people fainting in the packed crowds.
facts: Potential charges relate to homicide and negligent conduct, they said.
A further 51 people are receiving treatment in hospital, he said.
At least 40 people have died in a crush at a political rally in the southern Indian state of Tamil Nadu, officials say.
"TVK originally sought permission for a gathering of 10,000 people, but the actual crowd was more than double," senior police official V Selvaraj told Reuters news agency.
It was delayed by several hours, local media reported.
